short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to use extension that lets you put customized links on your new tab to help improve your workflow. Easy backup and import.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Increase efficiency and improve your workflow by putting your favorite links on the new tab page, making them easier to open.

Install this extension, then go to the extension popup to add or edit your own custom links and save them. You are ready to use the extension! When you open a new tab on your Chrome browser, your links are there. Your links can be edited at anytime. You can also export your custom links to a json file for backup or for a different computer. If you have a backup json file, you can import your links to this extension on Chrome browser.
